ctx: intros a b Q Ha Hb.
destruct a as [a Ca], b as [b Cb].
exceptions.tactic: exists (spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b Ca Cb).
exceptions.exn: Not an inductive goal with 1 constructor.

original: intros a b Q Ha Hb. unfold Cb in Ha, Hb. destruct a as [a Ca], b as [b Cb]. unfold spolyp. simpl. unfold spolyf. simpl. exists (spolyf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b Ca Cb). reflexivity.
